attributes.action: Bind private care homes to the Human Rights Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Law Lords ruling:  Private care home contracted to local authority not of itself exercising "functions of a public nature" so not bound by Human Rights Act. Contact Cliff Horne Suffolk Pensioners Association, and East Anglian Daily Times newspaper for full information. We all get old; the only alternative to growing old is death, do you want your loved ones - or yourselves, to later perhaps have to choose between life without any human rights, or death?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
